name: Adrienne Macias
body: The Tesla Model X is a full-sized all-electric crossover SUV made by Tesla Motors that uses falcon wing doors for access to the secondand third row seats. The prototype was unveiled at Tesla designstudios in Los Angeles on February 9, 2012.
